Fahira Idris Batal Bertemu Kapolda Soal Meme Joker Anies Baswedan
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by M Julnis Firmansyah, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Anggota DPD RI Fahira Idris batal bertemu Kapolda Metro Jaya Inspektur Jenderal Gatot Eddy soal meme Joker Anies Baswedan yang dipasang Ade Armando. Sebagai gantinya, Fahira akan menemui Direktur Kriminal Khusus Polda Metro Jaya, besok.
Fahira menjelaskan motivasinya melaporkan Ade ke polisi agar pelaku dengan kasus serupa juga diproses. Fahira melaporkan dosen UI itu karena mengunggah foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menggunakan riasan Joker di Facebook.
"Harapannya beberapa orang dengan perkara yang sama, merusak foto wajah pejabat negara, langsung dilakukan proses hukum, dicokok, dan ditangkap oleh polisi," kata Fahira saat dihubungi, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Jika polisi memberikan perhatian khusus kepada kasus meme Joker, Fahira berpendapat masyarakat nantinya akan melihat penerapan hukum tidak pandang bulu. Apa lagi, menurut Fahira, kasus Ade bukan masuk dalam delik aduan, sehingga polisi bisa memproses temuan ini tanpa menunggu laporan dari masyarakat.
Sebelumnya, Ade mengakui telah mengunggah foto Anies Baswedan dengan riasan wajah Joker di akun media sosialnya. Tapi menurut Ade, foto wajah Anies dengan makeup ala tokoh fiksi dalam DC Comics itu bukan buatan dirinya. Dia berujar foto itu merupakan bentuk kecaman.
"Anies Baswedan memang harus dikecam secara terbuka akibat anggaran Aica Aibon dan bolpen yang tidak masuk di akal," kata dia.
Unggahan Ade itu lalu dilaporkan Fahira karena diduga melanggar Pasal 32 Ayat 1 Jo Pasal 48 ayat 1 Undang-Undang Nomor 19 Tahun 2016 tentang Informasi dan Transaksi Elektronik.
Fahira mengatakan, Ade bukan hanya menghina Anies Baswedan, tapi juga institusi Gubernur DKI Jakarta. Sebab, foto yang Ade sebar tersebut merupakan milik Pemprov DKI dan Anies tengah memakai baju gubernur.
Ade Armando mengunggah foto meme Joker Anies Baswedan setelah heboh anggaran janggal DKI, seperti anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82 miliar dan anggaran pulpen senilai Rp 123 miliar.

Fahira Idris Cancel Meeting Police Chief Problem Joker Anies Baswedan Meme
Nov 6, 2019, 06:00 by M Julnis Firmansyah, Clara Maria Tjandra Dewi H.
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - DPD RI member Fahira Idris canceled meeting with the Jakarta Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy about the Joker Anies Baswedan meme installed by Ade Armando. Instead, Fahira will meet with the Special Criminal Director of the Jakarta Police, tomorrow.
Fahira explained his motivation to report Ade to the police so that the perpetrators with similar cases were also processed. Fahira reported that the UI lecturer was uploading a photo of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan using Joker makeup on Facebook.
"It is hoped that several people with the same case, damaging photos of the faces of state officials, will immediately undergo legal proceedings, be arrested and be arrested by the police," Fahira said when contacted on Wednesday 6 November 2019.
If the police pay special attention to the Joker meme case, Fahira believes the public will later see the application of the law indiscriminately. What's more, according to Fahira, Ade's case is not included in the offense of complaint, so that the police can process these findings without waiting for reports from the public.
Previously, Ade admitted that he had uploaded Anies Baswedan's photo with Joker's makeup on his social media account. But according to Ade, the photo of Anies's face with makeup in the style of a fictional character in DC Comics was not made by her. He said the photo was a form of criticism.
"Anies Baswedan must be openly criticized for Aica Aibon's budget and pens that don't make sense," he said.
Ade's upload was then reported by Fahira for allegedly violating Article 32 Paragraph 1 Jo Article 48 paragraph 1 of Law Number 19 Year 2016 concerning Information and Electronic Transactions.
Fahira said, Ade not only insulted Anies Baswedan, but also the institution of the Governor of DKI Jakarta. Because, the photo that Ade scattered was owned by DKI Provincial Government and Anies was wearing a governor's shirt.
Ade Armando uploaded a photo of Joker Anies Baswedan's meme after a tumultuous budget for DKI, such as the Aibon glue budget of Rp 82 billion and a pen budget of Rp 123 billion.
